definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The soldiers posted abroad in 2001 rotated home last year.
sentences.chinese: 2001年派駐國外的士兵去年輪換調防回國。

sentences.english: The troops stationed along the border three years ago have been rotated back to their original positions.
sentences.chinese: 三年前派駐在邊境的部隊現已輪換調防原地。
